name: oj-combobox-many

styleClasses.description: Changes the max-width to 100% so that form components will occupy all the available horizontal space
Aligns the text to the right regardless of the reading direction. This is normally used for right aligning numbers
Aligns the text to the left in ltr and to the right in rtl
Aligns the text to the right in ltr and to the left in rtl

description: A dropdown list that supports multiple selections, text input, and search filtering.

asyncValidators.description: Specifies a list of async validators for performing async validation by the element.

type.description: the conveter type registered with the oj.ConverterFactory. Supported types are 'number' and 'datetime'. See ConverterFactory for details. E.g., {converter: {type: 'number'}

options.description: optional Object literal of options that the converter expects. See IntlNumberConverter for options supported by the number converter. E.g., {converter: {type: 'number', options: {style: 'decimal'}}

describedBy.description: described the relationship between this component and another element.

disabled.description: Whether the component is disabled. The default is false.

displayOptions.description: Customize how to display to the user the form field's messages, converter and validator hints and help instruction text.

converterHint.description: Display options for auxilliary converter hint text that determines where it should be displayed in relation to the component.

helpInstruction.description:
Display options for auxilliary help instruction text that determines where it should be displayed
in relation to the component.

messages.description:
Display options for auxilliary message text that determines where it should be displayed
in relation to the component.

validatorHint.description:
Display options for auxilliary validator hint text that determines where it should be displayed
in relation to the component.

help.description:
Form component help information.

The properties supported on the help option are:

instruction.description:
this represents advisory information for the component
The default value is "".

helpHints.description: Represents hints for an oj-form-layout element to render help information on the label of the editable component.

definition.description: Hint for help definition text associated with the label.

source.description: Hint for help source URL associated with the label.

labelHint.description: Represents a hint for oj-form-layout element to render a label on the editable component.

messagesCustom.description: List of messages an app would add to the component

minLength.description: The minimum number of characters a user must type before search filtering is performed.

optionRenderer.description: The renderer function that renders the content of each option.

component.description: A reference to the combobox element.

parent.description: The parent of the data item. The parent is null for root node.

index.description: The index of the option, where 0 is the index of the first option. In the hierarchical case the index is relative to its parent.

depth.description: The depth of the option. The depth of the first level children under the invisible root is 0.

leaf.description: Whether the option is a leaf or a group.

data.description: The data object for the option.

parentElement.description: The option label element. The renderer can use this to directly append content.

options.description: The option items for the Combobox.

label.description: The display label for the option group.

optionsKeys.description: Specify the key names to use in the options array. Depending on options-keys means that the signature of the data does not match what is supported by the options attribute.

childKeys.description: The object for the child keys. It is ignored when using a oj.TreeDataProvider.

label.description: The key name for the label.

value.description: The key name for the value.

children.description: The key name for the children.

childKeys.description: The object for the child keys.

label.description: The key name for the label.

value.description: The key name for the value.

children.description: The key name for the children.

childKeys.description: The object for the child keys.

children.description: The key name for the children. It is ignored when using a oj.TreeDataProvider.

label.description: The key name for the label.

value.description: The key name for the value.

pickerAttributes.description: The style attributes for the drop down.

style.description: The css style to append to the picker.

class.description: The css class to append to the picker.

placeholder.description: A short hint that can be displayed before user selects or enters a value.

rawValue.description: The currently displayed text retrieved from the input field.

readonly.description: Specifies whether a value is readonly

required.description: Specifies whether a value is required.

translations.description: A collection of translated resources from the translation bundle, or null if this component has no resources.

filterFurther.description: Text at the top of drop down when not all results are fetched and users need to filter further.

noMatchesFound.description: No options found text for drop down.

required.description:
Provides properties to customize the summary, detail and hint text used by the
implicit required validator associated to any editable component that supports the
required option.

See the translations attribute and
required option for usage examples.

hint.description:
Hint text used by required validation error.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

messageDetail.description:
Message text that describes the details of the required validation error.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

messageSummary.description:
Message text for summarizing a required validation error.

See the translations attribute for usage examples.

valid.description: The validity state of the component

invalidHidden.description: The component has invalid messages hidden and no invalid messages showing. An invalid message is one with severity "error" or higher.

invalidShown.description: The component has invalid messages showing. An invalid message is one with severity "error" or higher.

pending.description:
The component is waiting for the validation state to be determined.
The "pending" state is set at the start of the convert/validate process.

validators.description: Specifies a list of validators for performing validation by the element.

type.description: the validator type that has a ValidatorFactory that can be retrieved using the Validation module. For a list of supported validators refer to ValidatorFactory. E.g., {validators: [{type: 'regExp'}]}

options.description: optional Object literal of options that the validator expects. E.g., {validators: [{type: 'regExp', options: {pattern: '[a-zA-Z0-9]{3,}'}}]}

valueOptions.description: The current values of the element and theirs associated display labels.

value.description: a current value of JET Combobox

label.description: display label of value above. If missing, String(value) is used.

refresh.description: Refreshes the combobox. This method does not accept any arguments.

validate.description: All messages are cleared, including custom messages added by the app. If no converter is present then processing continues to next step. If a converter is present, the UI value is first converted (i.e., parsed). If there is a parse error then the messages are shown. If there are no validators setup for the component the value option is updated using the display value. Otherwise all validators are run in sequence using the parsed value from the previous step. The implicit required validator is run first if the component is marked required. When a validation error is encountered it is remembered and the next validator in the sequence is run. At the end of validation if there are errors, the messages are shown. If there were no errors, then the value option is updated.

reset.description:
Resets the component by clearing all messages and messages attributes -
messagesCustom -
and updates the component's display value using the attribute value. User entered values will be
erased when this method is called.

showMessages.description:
Takes all deferred messages and shows them.
It then updates the valid property; e.g.,
if the valid state was "invalidHidden"
before showMessages(), the valid state will become "invalidShown" after showMessages().

If there were no deferred messages this method simply returns.

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a [property]Changed event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves a value for a property or a single subproperty for complex properties.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.

ojAnimateStart.description:
Triggered when a default animation is about to start, such as when the component is
being opened/closed or a child item is being added/removed. The default animation can
be cancelled by calling event.preventDefault.

action.description: The action that triggers the animation. Supported values are: "inline-open" - when an inline message container opens or increases in size "inline-close" - when an inline message container closes or decreases in size "notewindow-open" - when a note window opens "notewindow-close" - when a note window closes

endCallback.description: If the event listener calls event.preventDefault to cancel the default animation, it must call the endCallback function when it finishes its own animation handling and any custom animation has ended.

ojAnimateEnd.description: Triggered when a default animation has ended.

action.description: The action that triggers the animation. Supported values are: "inline-open" - when an inline message container opens or increases in size "inline-close" - when an inline message container closes or decreases in size "notewindow-open" - when a note window opens "notewindow-close" - when a note window closes

slots.description: The oj-combobox-many element accepts oj-option elements as children.

contextMenu.description: The contextMenu slot is set on the <oj-menu> instance within this element. It designates the JET Menu that this component should launch as a context menu.
